actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Sally Duncan Hall as an individual and as personal representative of the estates of Melissa Duncan, Elizabeth Duncan, Darlene Hall, Lavetta Hall, and Ronald Dewayne, deceased.

summary.text: Provides for the relief of Sally Duncan Hall as an individual and as personal representative of the estates of Melissa Duncan, Elizabeth Duncan, Darlene Hall, Lavetta Hall, and Ronald Dewayne, deceased.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Sally Duncan Hall as an individual and as personal representative of the estates of Melissa Duncan, Elizabeth Duncan, Darlene Hall, Lavetta Hall, and Ronald Dewayne, deceased.
